description: Episode of Series "Doubts and Certainties". An interview with A. S. Neil, headmaster of the pioneer school of Summerhill in Suffolk for fifty years. Here he discusses Hunkin and his belief that education must not be indoctrination and that the child's emotions should be completely free.
